title: Boxplot Calculation for Integer Data
name: LGF_Boxplot_DInt
description: Use a Boxplot diagram to get an overview of existing data.

input.name: execute
input.description: Activation of the calculation with each positive edge.

output.name: error
output.description: An error occurred during the execution of the FB

output.name: subfunctionStatus
output.description: Status or return value of called FB's, FC's and system blocks

output.name: q75
output.description: 3rd quartile or Q75 of the data series.

output.name: median
output.description: 2nd quartile or Median of the data series.

output.name: q25
output.description: 1st quartile or Q25 of the data series.

in/out.name: values
in/out.description: The array containing the data series for calculation

description_zh: 一个函数块FB，该函数块能够对整数数据数组执行箱形图计算。箱形图是一种统计图表，用于显示数据的分布情况，包括中位数、四分位数和异常值。该函数块接受一个布尔型输入"execute"，当该输入信号上升沿时，触发数据计算。另一个输入"rangeOutlier"用于指定异常值检测的参数。函数块输出包括异常值百分比、最大值、上四分位数、中位数、下四分位数、最小值、偏度等统计信息。其中，异常值是指在数据分布的上下界之外的数据点。数据分布的上下界可以通过"rangeOutlier"参数来调整。
